## NerdStats class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

`PLUGIN` that displays useful statistics regarding the playback as well as the network quality estimation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class NerdStats extends UICorePlugin 
```
**Extends:** UICorePlugin

## Remarks

Depends on:

- [BottomGear](./player.bottomgear.md) - where the button is attached

- [ClapprStats](./player.clapprstats.md) - to get the metrics from

The plugin is rendered as an item in the gear menu.

When clicked, it shows an overlay window with the information about the network speed, latency, etc, and recommended quality level.
